Running time137 minutes[1]CountryIndiaLanguageHindi
Do Aur Do Pyaar (transl. Two Plus Two is Love) is an upcoming Indian Hindi-language romantic comedy film starring Vidya Balan, Pratik Gandhi, Ileana D'Cruz and Sendhil Ramamurthy.[2] It is directed by Shirsha Guha Thakurta, in her directorial debut. The film is produced by Sameer Nair, Deepak Segal, Tanuj Garg, Atul Kasbekar and Swati Iyer Chawla under the banner Applause Entertainment and Ellipsis Entertainment Production.[3]. The film is an official adaptation of The Lovers.
The film scheduled for theatrical release on 19 April 2024.[4]


Cast[edit]
Vidya Balan as Kavya[5]
Pratik Gandhi as Ani[6]
Ileana D'Cruz as Nora[7]
Sendhil Ramamurthy as Vikram
Production[edit]
Filming[edit]
Principal photography commenced in November 2021[8] and wrapped in Ooty, in December 2021.[9]

Soundtrack[edit]
The soundtrack is composed by Lost Stories (DJs), The Local Train, Subhajit Mukherjee, Abhishek-Ananya and When Chai Met Toast. Lyrics is written by Kunaal Vermaa, Paras Thakur (The Local Train), Trina Mukherjee, Manoj Yadav, Ankur Tewari, Abhiruchi Chand, Azazul Haque, Subhajit Mukherjee. 

Track lisitngNo.TitleLyricsMusicSinger(s)Length1."Jaazbati Hai Dil"Kunaal VermaaLost Stories (DJs)Armaan Malik, Ananya Birla3:122."Tu Hai Kahaan"The Local TrainThe Local TrainLucky Ali3:403."TA RA TA RA TA"Trina MukherjeeSubajit MukherjeeVishal Dadlani1:56
Release[edit]
The film is scheduled for a theatrical release on 19 April 2024.

Distribution[edit]
AA Films and PVR Inox Pictures acquired domestic distribution rights and Sarigama Cinemas also acquired overseas distribution rights.

Home Media[edit]
Disney Hotstar acquired streaming rights post release of this film.

Reception[edit]
Do Aur Do Pyaar received positive reviews, praising D'Cruz and Gandhi’s performances calling it, Top-of-the-chemistry and majestic pairs.

^ "'Swapping wives?' Fans excited as Vidya Balan, Pratik Gandhi & Ileana announce their new film". MensXP. 17 January 2024. Retrieved 17 January 2024.
